Description:
Cre8. Negoti8. Celebr8!
MASSIVE FAMILY HOME WITH OUTSTANDING POTENTIAL!
If space is at the top of your priority list, 37 Stevensons Road could just be your perfect home! Featuring five huge bedrooms, multiple living zones and large landscaped surrounds, this is the ideal residence for a family looking to take advantage of this peaceful yet highly convenient location. While clean and very well looked after, a few minor updates could take this home to the next level!
Occupying an expansive block on a beautiful tree-lined road, the first thing youll notice about this wonderful single-storey property is its vast front yard bordered by manicured hedges and a remote vehicle gate for ultimate privacy. Once inside via the long driveway and carefully tended garden beds, youll immediately notice the amount of space on offer. The huge living room, to your right, greets you warmly with its own timber bar for entertaining guests. To your left, youll find the open-plan family/dining area with tiled flooring and plenty of natural light. The adjoining kitchen benefits from quality appliances, an abundance of cabinet space, an attractive central island, and a big walk-in pantry.
Moving further through the home, youll discover all 5 bedrooms. The master features a superb walk-in robe and spacious en suite for total privacy. The remaining four bedrooms all include built-in robes and share the large, centrally-located family bathroom with separate WC. Completing this fantastic residence is a generous laundry room, powder room, ducted heating, ceiling fans, reverse cycle air conditioning, and blinds and curtains throughout.
The exterior of this family sanctuary is every gardeners dream! The sprawling grounds provide lots of room for veggie gardens and flower beds, the large pergola is made for entertaining all year round, and the patio is perfect for the kids outdoor games. Additional features include three water tanks for garden use, an enormous four-car garage, a small garden shed, and a substantial second shed with vehicle access. Youll never struggle to find a place for the lawn mower!
Within a five-minute drive, youll find Cranbourne Swimming Pool, the beautiful Royal Botanic Gardens, St Peters College, Cranbourne West Primary School, Cranbourne Secondary College, the fantastic Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, and much more.
Could this be your forever family home? Enquire today!
